dcterms:description: The VQA v2.0 dataset is designed for visual question answering, containing images and corresponding questions that require understanding of the visual content to answer.
dcterms:title: VQA v2.0

dcterms:creator: Drew A Hudson
Christopher D Manning
dcterms:description: GQA is a dataset for compositional question answering over real-world images, requiring reasoning skills and understanding of spatial relationships.
dcterms:title: GQA

dcterms:description: NLVR2 is a visual reasoning dataset that requires determining whether a natural language statement correctly describes two related images.
dcterms:title: NLVR2
